snippet: A Human Rights Watch video report documents “simultaneous” attacks on churches across Egypt on the same day security forces violently dispersed two Islamist sit-ins in Cairo.
abstract: A Human Rights Watch video report documents “simultaneous” attacks on churches across Egypt on the same day security forces violently dispersed two Islamist sit-ins in Cairo.

headline.main: Egyptian Police Failed to Defend Churches, Rights Group Says

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
